ProteinName	tRNA-dihydrouridine(47) synthase [NAD(P)(+)]-like (EC 1.3.1.89) (mRNA-dihydrouridine synthase DUS3L) (EC 1.3.1.-) (tRNA-dihydrouridine synthase 3-like)
GeneName	DUS3L
Length	408
Function	Catalyzes the synthesis of dihydrouridine, a modified base, in various RNAs, such as tRNAs, mRNAs and some long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) (PubMed:34556860). Mainly modifies the uridine in position 47 (U47) in the D-loop of most cytoplasmic tRNAs (PubMed:34556860). Also able to mediate the formation of dihydrouridine in some mRNAs, thereby regulating their translation (PubMed:34556860).
